import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { TabContent, TabPane,Nav, NavItem, NavLink} from 'reactstrap'; import classnames from 'classnames'; const Tab2 = (props) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('1'); const toggle = tab => { if (activeTab !== tab) setActiveTab(tab); } return (
{ toggle('1'); }}>Hotels { toggle('2'); }}>Packages { toggle('3'); }}>Places
); } export default Tab2;
